items: Carts can only be distributed through the RetroForge Platform
Carts cannot be published on other websites or platforms
Cart files cannot be shared directly (users must share Arcade page links)
Bundled binaries (Engine + cart) are subject to the same restrictions as cart files

content: The Engine splash screen and credits screen handle attribution. No additional attribution is required beyond the MIT License text.

sections.heading: Bundled Binaries
content: Bundled binaries (RetroForge Engine + Cart) are available for download from Arcade pages. These binaries:

items: Contain the MIT-licensed Engine (subject to MIT License terms)
Contain cart files (subject to Terms of Service distribution restrictions)
Can be shared as downloaded from the Platform
Cannot be redistributed or modified beyond the original download
Must be distributed through the RetroForge Platform only

content: When you download a bundled binary, you are downloading both the Engine (MIT licensed) and a cart (Terms of Service restricted). Both sets of terms apply.
